p: All the strains tested were susceptible to the standard drug (fluconazole for Candida species and Cryptococcus neoformans; amphotericin B for A. flavus). Linear regression showed that there was a positive relationship between concentration and zone of inhibition ( Figure 2). The slopes for all, except A. flavus, were positive. The essential oil did not show a zone of inhibition against the isolate of A. flavus. The negative control (DMSO) did not show a zone of inhibition.
